test.name: TC01 - Acessar o site do Orange HRM

kw.name: Abrir o navegador e acessar o site
Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (134.0.6998.165) detected in PATH at C:\Users\André\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (135.0.7049.42); currently, chromedriver 135.0.7049.84 is recommended for chrome 135.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Verificar se a página foi aberta
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
